item.title: Mentioned by PR Newswire (press release)
item.description:
World's Largest Dark Sky Preserve Established in Wood Buffalo National Park
2, 2013 /CNW/ - Mr. Brian Jean, Member of Parliament for Fort McMurray—Athabasca on behalf of the Honourable Leona Aglukkaq, Canada's Environment Minister and Minister for Parks Canada, announced today the Royal Astronomical Society of Canada's ...
